name: cropt2
description: A lightweight but powerful JavaScript image cropper
author: Filipe Laborde <fil@rezox.com> + Theodore Brown <theodorejb@outlook.com>

scripts.build:js:esm: tsc --declaration && tsc src/cropt.ts --module ESNext --target ES2017 --outDir dist/esm && terser dist/cropt.js --passes=2 --toplevel -c -m -o dist/cropt.esm.min.js
scripts.build:js:classic: tsc src/cropt.ts --target ES2017 --outDir dist/ && terser dist/cropt.js --passes=2 --toplevel -c -m  -o dist/cropt.min.js && node package.mjs dist/cropt.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:js:esm && npm run build:js:classic && npm run build:css
